title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Course overview, applications of machine learning, and types of machine learning (supervised vs unsupervised).

title: Chapter 2: Data Preprocessing
description: Importance of data quality, techniques for data cleaning, handling missing values, and normalization.

title: Chapter 3: Feature Engineering
description: Methods for feature scaling, encoding categorical variables, and selecting and creating features.

title: Chapter 4: Data-Driven Challenges in Supervised Learning
description: Engagement with real datasets to explore and apply regression techniques.

title: Chapter 5: Classification Techniques
description: Introduction to decision trees and random forests as classification methods.

title: Chapter 6: Ensemble Methods
description: Discussion on bagging, boosting, and the significance of ensemble learning in improving model accuracy.

title: Chapter 7: Introduction to Neural Networks
description: Basic concepts of neural networks, their structure, and applications in machine learning.

title: Chapter 8: Model Evaluation and Testing
description: Overview of evaluation metrics including accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score.

title: Chapter 9: Unsupervised Learning Techniques
description: Examination of clustering algorithms like K-means and hierarchical clustering.

title: Chapter 10: Dimensionality Reduction
description: Techniques for reducing the dimensionality of datasets, specifically through PCA (Principal Component Analysis).

title: Chapter 11: Neural Networks and Their Applications
description: Introduction to deep learning concepts and their real-world applications.

title: Chapter 12: Introduction to Advanced Topics
description: Exploration of reinforcement learning and its significance in machine learning.

title: Chapter 13: The Role of Data in AI
description: Analysis of data collection, data labeling, and the impact of data quality, supported by real-world case studies.

title: Chapter 14: Final Project Work
description: Workshop dedicated to the preparation and presentation of the final project.

title: Chapter 15: Final Project Presentations
description: Student presentations showcasing the final collaborative projects on machine learning applications.
